name: Cocum (Ad-free apk)
description:
[ I can't sell ad-free version on google play because Google does not support developers from Croatia (merchant account not supported), still to this day, even though we should be equal to all other EU members by now... :( ]

Free (Ad-supported) playstore version:  Cocum (Free)

Cocum is a relaxing, minimal and inspiring puzzle game that offers 81 unique levels, each required to be solved multiple times in individual ways, allowing you to immerse yourself into the art of puzzle solving. Some may be very easy, and some might catch your brain off guard! An inspiring soundtrack will guide you through your journey.

Features:

- 81 individually designed levels
- optional Dark Mode for Sith Lords and similar
- optional Hard Mode for a bit of extra challenge
- Replayable levels option for rerunning the game
- Ability to skip levels after acquiring at least 1 star

Please feel free to contact me, if you have any issues or suggestions related to the game, at veselivepar@gmail.com ~ sincerely, your local math student (at the time of being).
